Speech.Name: Hemlighet
Speech.Content: Bu' I'm 'opin' we can be good frien's.

Speech.Name: Hemlighet
Speech.Content: Aye. I run the attunemen' service in the Vangr.

Speech.Name: Hemlighet
Speech.Content: So, Aye. I'll assume somethin' bout yeh.

Speech.Name: Hemlighet
Speech.Content: I think yer the kin' to sacrifice power for wealth.

Speech.Name: Hemlighet
Speech.Content: Now you migh' feel you can throw yer mask a bit further.

Speech.Name: Hemlighet
Speech.Content: Aye, Tha's how strong my assumptions are.

Speech.Name: Hemlighet
Speech.Content: If yeh wanna know wha' else I can do...

Speech.Name: Hemlighet
Speech.Content: Come see me in the Vangr.
